4211.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|118|640$أَرْسَلْنَا|We have sent|112|135|1342$رُسُلاً|Messengers|97|120|4654$مِّن قَبْلِكَ|before you.|102|125|47$مِنْهُم|Among them|102|125|730$مَّن|(are) some|92|103|76$قَصَصْنَا|We have related|129|142|10187$عَلَيْكَ|to you,|71|97|2245$وَمِنْهُم|and among them|130|156|745$مَّن|(are) some|92|118|76$لَّمْ|not|42|68|63$نَقْصُصْ|We have related|129|142|15210$عَلَيْكَۗ|to you.|71|80|2245$وَمَا|And not|72|90|46$كَانَ|is|57|75|913$لِرَسُولٍ|for any Messenger|142|160|3565$أَن|that|48|66|655$يَأْتِىَ|he brings|80|98|2261$بِـَٔـايَةٍ|a Sign|62|80|2881$إِلَّا|except|65|74|86$بِإِذْنِ|by (the) permission|148|162|919$ٱللَّهِۚ|(of) Allah.|86|115|2$فَإِذَا|So when|77|106|1730$جَآءَ|comes|62|91|4023$أَمْرُ|(the) Command|122|151|8630$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|100|606$قُضِىَ|it will be decided|131|153|8174$بِٱلْحَقِّ|in truth,|78|123|692$وَخَسِرَ|and will lose|100|145|15211$هُنَالِكَ|there|75|120|2816$ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ|the falsifiers.|112|134|6994$

4212.verse: ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|71|123$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|169|138$جَعَلَ|made|66|101|195$لَكُمُ|for you|67|102|196$ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمَ|the cattle,|91|126|15212$لِتَرْكَبُواْ|that you may ride|138|156|15213$مِنْهَا|some of them|110|195|246$وَمِنْهَا|and some of them|139|309|6331$تَأْكُلُونَ|you eat.|86|171|2892$

4213.verse: وَلَكُمْ|And for you|97|106|387$فِيهَا|in them|69|86|253$مَنَـٰفِعُ|(are) benefits|111|128|12078$وَلِتَبْلُغُواْ|and that you may reach|180|197|15203$عَلَيْهَا|through them|109|126|1269$حَاجَةً|a need|73|82|9152$فِى|(that is) in|91|98|89$صُدُورِكُمْ|your breasts;|112|125|2759$وَعَلَيْهَا|and upon them|119|132|2592$وَعَلَى|and upon|81|94|67$ٱلْفُلْكِ|the ships|80|93|6502$تُحْمَلُونَ|you are carried.|125|132|12253$

4214.verse: وَيُرِيكُمْ|And He shows you|142|168|705$ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ|His Signs.|87|139|706$فَأَىَّ|Then which|96|148|15214$ءَايَـٰتِ|(of the) Signs|112|164|2041$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|107|2$تُنكِرُونَ|will you deny?|113|113|15215$

4215.verse: أَفَلَمْ|Do they not|99|111|9302$يَسِيرُواْ|travel|90|115|9303$فِى|through|71|96|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land|92|117|100$فَيَنظُرُواْ|and see|101|126|9304$كَيْفَ|how|66|91|288$كَانَ|was|57|69|913$عَـٰقِبَةُ|(the) end|83|90|3299$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|133|20$مِن قَبْلِهِمْۚ|(were) before them?|156|170|1094$كَانُوٓاْ|They were|90|104|94$أَكْثَرَ|more numerous|120|134|2155$مِنْهُمْ|than them|88|95|730$وَأَشَدَّ|and mightier|101|111|4154$قُوَّةً|(in) strength|104|123|7723$وَءَاثَارًا|and impressions|124|143|15116$فِى|in|48|67|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land,|92|111|100$فَمَآ|but not|69|88|132$أَغْنَىٰ|availed|71|81|6428$عَنْهُم|them|66|123|2643$مَّا|what|53|167|262$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|231|94$يَكْسِبُونَ|earn.|97|154|759$

4216.verse: فَلَمَّا|Then when|93|101|141$جَآءَتْهُمْ|came to them|112|128|4930$رُسُلُهُم|their Messengers|132|148|6645$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs|131|147|880$فَرِحُواْ|they rejoiced|107|123|5591$بِمَا|in what|69|77|43$عِندَهُم|they had|81|92|6910$مِّنَ|of|50|72|156$ٱلْعِلْمِ|the knowledge,|121|143|1119$وَحَاقَ|and enveloped|116|138|8381$بِهِم|them|53|75|125$مَّا|what|53|75|262$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|128|94$بِهِۦ|[at it]|60|306|204$يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ|mock.|123|369|5420$

4217.verse: فَلَمَّا|So when|77|86|141$رَأَوْاْ|they saw|81|98|11280$بَأْسَنَا|Our punishment|123|140|6156$قَالُوٓاْ|they said,|86|104|101$ءَامَنَّا|`We believe|100|118|78$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|84|79$وَحْدَهُۥ|Alone|86|95|6518$وَكَفَرْنَا|and we disbelieve|137|160|15216$بِمَا|in what|69|115|43$كُنَّا|we used (to)|106|152|4361$بِهِۦ|with Him|76|122|204$مُشْرِكِينَ|associate.`|104|127|5497$

4218.verse: فَلَمْ يَكُ|But did not|93|111|15217$يَنفَعُهُمْ|benefit them|104|140|973$إِيمَـٰنُهُمْ|their faith|85|121|13910$لَمَّا|when|55|91|3471$رَأَوْاْ|they saw|81|117|11280$بَأْسَنَاۖ|Our punishment.|128|146|6156$سُنَّتَ|(Such is the) Way|141|150|10483$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|98|606$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|78|232$قَدْ|(has) indeed|103|120|1097$خَلَتْ|preceded|81|98|3295$فِى|among|63|80|89$عِبَادِهِۖۦ|His slaves.|90|99|868$وَخَسِرَ|And are lost|100|193|15211$هُنَالِكَ|there|75|261|2816$ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ|the disbelievers.|128|221|4590$

4211.verse: And We have already sent messengers before you. Among them are those [whose stories] We have related to you, and among them are those [whose stories] We have not related to you. And it was not for any messenger to bring a sign [or verse] except by permission of Allah. So when the command of Allah comes, it will be concluded in truth, and the falsifiers will thereupon lose [all].

4212.verse: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat.

4213.verse: And for you therein are [other] benefits and that you may realize upon them a need which is in your breasts; and upon them and upon ships you are carried.

4214.verse: And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allah do you deny?

4215.verse: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? They were more numerous than themselves and greater in strength and in impression on the land, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.

4216.verse: And when their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they [merely] rejoiced in what they had of knowledge, but they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

4217.verse: And when they saw Our punishment, they said," We believe in Allah alone and disbelieve in that which we used to associate with Him."

4218.verse: But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment. [It is] the established way of Allah which has preceded among His servants. And the disbelievers thereupon lost [all].
